episodes.title: Memories of the Rajneeshpuram commune | Your Thoughts
episodes.description:
Last night, we brought you the story of Sarito Carroll, who spent her childhood in the cult of Rajneesh near Antelope, Ore. Here's what you had to say.

Read more: https://www.kgw.com/article/news/history/former-child-rajneeshpuram-breaks-silence-hidden-truth/283-88e80afe-d2af-444f-ab9d-689520aba523

episodes.title: Breaking 40 years of silence: Former child of Rajneeshpuram reveals her hidden truth
episodes.description:
Sarito Carroll breaks her silence about the abuse she suffered as a child at Rajneeshpuram, the cult community of Baghwan Shree Rajneesh's followers in central Oregon, her years of struggle after leaving the commune and her pathway to healing. 

Read more: https://www.kgw.com/article/news/history/former-child-rajneeshpuram-breaks-silence-hidden-truth/283-88e80afe-d2af-444f-ab9d-689520aba523

episodes.title: A child of Rajneeshpuram breaks her silence, 40 years later | The Story | April 24, 2025
episodes.description:
April 24 on The Story: After the 2018 Netflix documentary series "Wild Wild Country," many people are now aware of a particularly strange chapter in Oregon history, when a guru called Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh formed a secretive commune near the small, rural town of Antelope. It culminated in a hostile takeover of local politics, murder plots and the poisoning of salad bars in The Dalles. Sarito Carroll was raised in the cult of Rajneesh, made a child of the commune. And 40 years after it all came crashing down, she's telling her story in a new memoir — the story of the children abandoned in the midst of an insular community, made to do its bidding and abused.

Watch more The Story videos: http://bit.ly/watchTheStory
Follow The Story on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheStoryKGW
Follow The Story on Instagram: https://instagram.com/thestorykgw

episodes.title: Rajneesh Survivor: Full interview with Sarito Carroll
episodes.description:
Sarito Carroll talks with Laural Porter about the abuse she suffered in the early 1980s while a child at Rajneeshpuram, the commune in central Oregon. In a new memoir, Carroll breaks her silence about her experience growing up in the cult of Baghwan Shree Rajneesh.

Read more: https://www.kgw.com/article/news/history/former-child-rajneeshpuram-breaks-silence-hidden-truth/283-88e80afe-d2af-444f-ab9d-689520aba523

episodes.title: Update: Rajneesh | KGW 1984 award-winning documentary
episodes.description:
The Peabody-award winning KGW documentary from 1984 about the Rajneeshpuram commune in Central Oregon and its founding by charismatic leader, Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh. We're uploading this special to coincide with the story of Sorita Carroll, a child of the commune who is breaking her silence after 40 years.

Read more: https://www.kgw.com/article/news/history/former-child-rajneeshpuram-breaks-silence-hidden-truth/283-88e80afe-d2af-444f-ab9d-689520aba523

episodes.title: The Arrest of Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh | KGW Special (1985)
episodes.description:
This KGW Special Newscast from 1985 chronicles the capture of Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh after he fled the eastern Oregon commune Rajneeshpuram. We're uploading this special to coincide with the story of Sorita Carroll, a child of the commune who is breaking her silence after 40 years.

Read more: https://www.kgw.com/article/news/history/former-child-rajneeshpuram-breaks-silence-hidden-truth/283-88e80afe-d2af-444f-ab9d-689520aba523

episodes.title: Women accuse Oregon spiritual guru of sexual abuse, claim he's running a cult
episodes.description:
A longtime self-proclaimed spiritual guru has been accused of sexual assault by multiple women. Former members of The Movement Center, a yoga and meditation center once located in Portland’s Kerns neighborhood, told KGW that J. Michael Shoemaker, who goes by Swami Chetanananda or "Swamiji," strangled and psychologically harmed them over the span of decades.

Read more: https://www.kgw.com/article/news/local/the-story/shoemaker-swami-chananandra-portland-oregon-guru-sexual-assault-women-movement-center/283-2741736c-9e9b-43ea-91f7-9728d70e6d19

Watch more The Story videos: http://bit.ly/watchTheStory
